problem_text_cn: 如图,已知AB是⊙O的直径,CD是弦且CD⊥AB,BC=6,AC=8,则sin∠ABD的值是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that AB is the diameter of O, CD is the chord and CD ⊥ AB, BC = N_0, AC = N_1, then the value of sin∠ABD is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵AB是⊙O的直径,CD⊥AB,∴弧AC=弧AD,∴∠ABD=∠ABC．根据勾股定理求得AB=10,∴sin∠ABD=sin∠ABC=\frac{8}{10}=\frac{4}{5}．故选:D．
raw_comment: 此题综合考查了垂径定理以及圆周角定理的推论,熟悉锐角三角函数的概念．
